description:
Keep your core and extremities nice and toasty this assortment of easy-to-activate warmers. No fumes, no flames and no batteries, just warming comfort.

  • Contain 8 pairs of Hand warmers, 8 pairs of Toe warmers and 8 Adhesive body warmers
  • Great for sore muscles too
  • Toe warmers fit into the front of shoes or boots
  • Hand warmers fit inside gloves or pockets
  • Body warmers last 12+ hours, Toe warmers last 6+ hours, Hand warmers last 7+ hours
  • Each is sealed in its own airtight pocket and activated by contact with the air (oxidization)
  • Pause heat by putting them in any airtight container – needs to be used within a few days
  • Ingredients include: iron powder, water, salt, activated charcoal and vermiculite
  • Can be discarded in household garbage
name: Grabber Warmers Pack
